title: Nemesis draft community vs Riot?
body:
will there be some fun games between the community and team riot?  I know they just did some for Lunar Revel but TFI Friday its POETS Day so why not :P

also are the pro's gonna be doing a match like with urf and poro king mode just to see how they do on maybe some not so often played champs?

replies.body:
I'll play later this afternoon if anyone's up. ^_^

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/084/383/anteater.jpg
Challenge accepted.

New challenge
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/59147558.jpg
I will enjoy not knowing how to play champions I don't know how to play!
ManWolf

> [{quoted}](name=ManWolfAxeBoss,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-13T19:47:43.624+0000)
>
> ManWolf

Nemesis Dominion, mayhaps?

Also question for reds about the icon:  Is it only 1 game minimum to earn it?  Does a custom Nemesis lobby count if I want my games to ALL be Dominion?

Rioters won the first match in a blaze of outrageous glory :3

Edit: Had to link instead of attach because attachments weren't working.

https://41.media.tumblr.com/81ede9f94b58e11e5432e72451c7b323/tumblr_njqhvmbY4r1smb6iho1_1280.png

> Rioters won the first match in a blaze of outrageous glory :3

Truly

> 
> https://41.media.tumblr.com/81ede9f94b58e11e5432e72451c7b323/tumblr_njqhvmbY4r1smb6iho1_1280.png

Aw, is it JUST going to be SR?  I thought for sure MWAB would be pushing for Dominion.  Either way, I missed my chance to get in for the second game.

> [{quoted}](name=Kholdstare13,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=00100001,timestamp=2015-02-13T23:59:02.679+0000)
>
> Aw, is it JUST going to be SR?  I thought for sure MWAB would be pushing for Dominion.  Either way, I missed my chance to get in for the second game.

There isn't one that I know of. The Rioters I've added got off.

> [{quoted}](name=Keagn,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=001000010000,timestamp=2015-02-14T00:02:33.960+0000)
>
> There isn't one that I know of. The Rioters I've added got off.

Lame.  They didn't even answer the question about the icon.  How many games minimum, and do these customs count?

> [{quoted}](name=Kholdstare13,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=0010000100000000,timestamp=2015-02-14T00:06:27.020+0000)
>
> Lame.  They didn't even answer the question about the icon.  How many games minimum, and do these customs count?

I'm not yet sure. It may be 5, or it might just take a little while to actually get it. Still testing this.

Game is up. It's called Riot Vs. Community Nemesis

pw: poppypls

You have to search in the special nemesis section btw

And private game checked.
All these rules man. So many rules! You're not the boss of me.. ..you're not even my real Dad!
but he is the boss of you. that's why he has Boss in his username =3

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2015-02-13T22:45:22.836+0000)
>
> All these rules man. So many rules! You're not the boss of me.. ..you're not even my real Dad!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bW7Op86ox9g

> [{quoted}](name=ManWolfAxeBoss,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-02-13T22:36:24.720+0000)
>
> pw: poppypls

plz...no...not Poppy. Have mercy. Back when my friends kept inviting me to ARAMs and I had all the 450 and 1350 IP champs. Out of all them....forever Poppy, and the few times I didn't get Poppy....there just had to be someone on my team that had her. So like, no. No Poppy. Have mercy, plz. =C
Let's start ~2:30pm PST. I'll post a room name & password in here around then.

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-02-13T20:43:37.699+0000)
>
> Let's start ~2:30pm PST. I'll post a room name & password in here around then.

Sounds good ^_^
Had a lot of fun guys! 5 man TP's op
Is it over already?
You guys gave me Zed, I have never played Zed before.  I have come to the realization I hate Zed, lol.
Well that didn't go too well for me.
I'm a bit late getting home, think I missed the first one.
Can I join in? :D
i am guessing that team riot will probably set up a game and put a password here in the forums for people to join i am not sure.
If we have a bunch of peeps, we'll probably split into multiple games so more people can join in on the fun :)

> [{quoted}](name=RiotTerra,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-02-13T20:20:59.616+0000)
>
> If we have a bunch of peeps, we'll probably split into multiple games so more people can join in on the fun :)

Alright, interested in some warm ups? :3
I wanna play,...though still at work.....yes it's true I work. ...be on after 430 pm pst please invite me.... luznuts
All of those are good in this mode lol
Did I miss it ; ;
one thing i do have to ask is if there will also be some lower elo Rioters playing so that some bronze and silver players get the chance to go up against some rioters who are not gold/plat/diamond.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilScotsman1974,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=l25wANAX,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-13T20:28:41.740+0000)
>
> one thing i do have to ask is if there will also be some lower elo Rioters playing so that some bronze and silver players get the chance to go up against some rioters who are not gold/plat/diamond.

We should do a practice run, add me if you're interested in doing that.
I would be down

Ooo, I was expecting an adding fest and one of us set it up. I wanna do this so bad >:]

Just curious if I have time for another match before this one.
ManWolfAxeBoss. Come at me!
